bike.description: FSR technology, optimized for BRAIN shock, M5 Alloy, fully butted and manipulated frame with ORE downtube, forged and relieved head tube & BB shell, sealed cartridge bearings, disc compatible, 90mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Specialized BRAIN shock, manufactured by Fox Racing Shox, air spring, adjustable rebound damping, 11.7" length X 1.875" stroke
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Thomson, 7000 Series Aluminum, 2-bolt adjust, set back head, 30.9mm x 367/410mm
